content: In addition to the given prompt, add a new requirement that the movie theaters considered in the chart must have a customer satisfaction rating of at least 3 stars out of 5.

To incorporate the new requirement into the given prompt, you can modify the instructions as follows:

"In addition to the given criteria, ensure that the movie theaters considered in the chart have a customer satisfaction rating of at least 3 stars out of 5."

This requirement ensures that only those theaters which meet a minimum standard of customer satisfaction are included, thereby focusing on quality experiences for the viewers.
